程序包 nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.persistency.reader

类 XMLFileReader

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.persistency.reader.XMLFileReader
所有已实现的接口:
FileReader
public class XMLFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileReader
"Composite". reading map files and saved game files from XML. representing the current game state in order for the player to resume games.
作者:
Rae 300535154

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadOriginMap

      public Board loadOriginMap​(java.lang.String fileName)
      load the board from the original game levels, which contains all essential information of each tile. Tile type and Tile coordinate and (info message or key/door color)
      指定者:
      loadOriginMap 在接口中 FileReader
      参数:
      fileName - game levels
      返回:
      the completed board

    • loadSavedMap

      public Board loadSavedMap​(java.lang.String fName)
      load the board from saved game state, with updated tile status.
      指定者:
      loadSavedMap 在接口中 FileReader
      参数:
      fName - saved game files
      返回:
      the saved board

    • loadSavedActions

      public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> loadSavedActions​(java.lang.String fName)
      load the saved action records file. With timer, actor, and direction.
      指定者:
      loadSavedActions 在接口中 FileReader
      参数:
      fName - saved file name
      返回:
      a list of actions and records map
